description:
Nidoking is one of the Pok√©mon that resides of an island among the followers of the Meowth of Bounty.
When Team Rocket`s Meowth land on the island and could not use Pay Day, Shimajio suggested that this could be a test of their beleifs and decided to give Meowth some battle experience on the island`s battle arena in an attempt to make to learn Pay Day.
Nidoking managed to defeat Meowth after Meowth ran out of energy trying to run away from it.
name: Nidoking (Meowth of Bounty Followers)
